Straight Shot looks to them.

" I do.  Nightshift and Rat Trap went out to =
look for him but now we haven't heard back from them either ."

It's at thi=
s time when Tucson shows up.

" I understand they're being brought back to =
the Ark.  Night Shift has been damaged during his mission."

He takes his p=
lace in the meeting room. 

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
